class_notes: This course is cross-listed with GH 550.
course_description: Prerequisite/concurrent: EPI 530 or EPI 504.  The purpose of the course is to familiarize students with the current purview of sexually transmitted disease in the developing and industrialized world.
sections: Class Nbr: 3281, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 10-11:50a, Instructor: Spaulding/Richard, Status: Open
